title: Bug 21834: Deleting items corrupts layout
description: Bug 21834: Deleting items corrupts layout in Build 2002071610021.
OB: 1. Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
EB: 1. Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs. The second row should remain.
SR: 1. Open the application. 2. Navigate to the Coolbar. 3. Press the Delete button to delete the first item on the second row. 4. Observe that the second row is removed instead of remaining intact. 5. Observe that the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
